name: NoobaVSS-Video Surveillance System
tagline: Have your own smart surveillance system
body:
### NoobaVSS Video Surveillance System
Deploy your own Smart Surveillance System now!

NoobaVSS is free and open source smart surveillance system.It is based on Qt and use OpenCV for image processing.

###NoobaVSS
[NoobaVSS](https://github.com/Asitha/NoobaVSS) is the main platform which serves plug-ins, and provide user interface.

###NoobaVSS Plug-ins
Plug-ins consist of different functionalities suitable for different tasks. As a collection of plug-ins, any specific surveillance context can be addressed.

#### Available Plug-ins
Several widely applicable set of plug-ins are available. You can build your own too.

[Background Subtraction](https://github.com/Asitha/nooba-plugin-bgsubstractor)

[Blob Tracking and Tagging](https://github.com/hachat/nooba-plugin-tracking)

[Abandoned Object Detector](https://github.com/hachat/nooba-plugin-left-bag-detector)

[Blob Counting](https://github.com/hachat/nooba-plugin-blob-counter)

[Face Detection](https://github.com/charithwije/nooba-plugin-face_detection)

[Face Based Anomaly Detection](https://github.com/charithwije/nooba-plugin-faceanomaly1)

[Speed Mismatch](https://github.com/ayshsandu/nooba-plugin-speed-mismatch)

#### Create your own plug-in!!
 [Plug-in Template](https://github.com/Asitha/nooba-plugin-template) is available to start with your own logic.

### Authors and Contributors
Asitha Nanayakkara (@Asitha), Chathuranga Hettiarachchi (@hachat), Charith Wijenayake (@charithwije) Ayesha Dissanayake (@ayeshsandu) 

Supervised by Dr. Chathura De Silva

Department of Computer Science and Engineering,
University of Moratuwa,
Sri Lanka.

### Support or Contact
Please don't hesitate to contact authors for any clarification.
